name: Way Where There's a Will
text: During the Main Phase: The turn player can excavate cards from the top of their Deck up to the number of cards their opponent controls, and if they do, they add 1 excavated card to their hand, then they place the rest and 1 card from their hand on the bottom of the Deck in any order. This effect of "Way Where There's a Will" can only be used once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if the turn player excavated 9 or more cards with this card's effect this turn: They can activate this effect; shuffle all cards on their opponent's field and GY into the Deck.
